description: This file contains setup instructions for GitHub authentication, environment variable configuration, and code that utilizes the agno.agent.Agent class with GithubTools to interact with a GitHub repository, including listing pull requests and other repository operations.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Class responsible for orchestrating interactions with tools and managing instructions and responses.

classes.name: GithubTools
classes.description: Class providing methods to interact with GitHub API, such as listing pull requests and issues.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to output responses from the agent, such as listing pull requests or repository info.
